courses.description: Learn how to design, analyze, and improve mechanical systems, from engines to manufacturing processes.

courses.description: Explore the principles of electrical circuits, power systems, and electronic devices.

courses.description: Understand the development and maintenance of software applications and computing systems.
courses.title: Computer Engineering

courses.description: Study the design and construction of infrastructure, including roads, bridges, and buildings.

courses.description: Dive into chemical processes and the production of materials, fuels, and pharmaceuticals.

courses.description: Learn about aerospace systems, including aircraft, spacecraft, and propulsion technologies.
courses.title: Aerospace Engineering

courses.description: Focus on sustainable environmental solutions, such as waste management and pollution control.
courses.title: Environmental Engineering

courses.description: Discover how to design and optimize industrial systems for efficiency and productivity.
courses.title: Industrial Engineering

courses.description: Master the principles of biomedical devices, prosthetics, and healthcare technology.
courses.title: Biomedical Engineering
